summary: This is a JPMorgan Chase Bank account statement for Jeffrey Epstein's private bank asset account covering September 2002. It shows two significant wire transfers: $1,000,000 to Palm Beach National Bank & Trust Co. for Jeffrey Epstein, and $5,000,000 to the same bank for Ghislaine Maxwell, both authorized by client letter.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The primary holder of the JPMorgan Private Bank asset account from which the financial transactions originate.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Received a $5,000,000 wire transfer from Jeffrey Epstein's JPMorgan account to Palm Beach National Bank & Trust Co., authorized by a client letter.

connections.description: Epstein authorized a $5,000,000 wire transfer from his JPMorgan account to Maxwell's account at Palm Beach National Bank & Trust Co.

events.title: $1M Wire Transfer to Epstein's Palm Beach Account
events.description: A $1,000,000 wire transfer was sent from Jeffrey Epstein's JPMorgan account to Palm Beach National Bank & Trust Co., for the benefit of Jeffrey Epstein, authorized by a letter from the client.

events.title: $5M Wire Transfer to Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: A $5,000,000 wire transfer was sent from Jeffrey Epstein's JPMorgan account to Palm Beach National Bank & Trust Co., for the benefit of Ghislaine Maxwell, authorized by a letter from the client.

events.title: Sale of Money Market Fund
events.description: A sale of $5,000,000 from the J P Morgan Tax Free Money Market Fund Institutional Share Class was executed, with J.P. Morgan Securities Inc. acting as agent.

locations: 345 Park Avenue, New York, NY 10154-1002 (JPMorgan Chase Bank address)
Palm Beach National Bank & Trust Co. (Financial institution receiving wire transfers)
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein maintained a private bank asset account with JPMorgan Chase Bank as of September 2002.
On September 18, 2002, Epstein transferred $5,000,000 to Ghislaine Maxwell via Palm Beach National Bank & Trust Co., authorized by a client letter.
On September 16, 2002, Epstein transferred $1,000,000 to his own account at Palm Beach National Bank & Trust Co.
The document is marked 'Confidential Treatment Requested by JPMorgan' and is part of a legal production (JPM-SDNY-00005512).
The transactions indicate substantial financial activity and a direct monetary link between Epstein and Maxwell during this period.
